text: @realDonaldTrump You might win somewhere - right now you have  96,354 people who DIED of the Covid-19 virus. You have shown NO compassion for the families instead in FL you want the numbers fudged??  Really.  what of the VETS who a drug was tested on? don't say you support the troops NOT / BS
